EmailTemplate.name: CT AutoRedirect
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c} - {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} AutoRedirect has been activated.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Customer_Transition__c.OwnerFullName}:
Account number {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c}, {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} has been migrated to OD South. The OD North account has been set to auto redirect. The Workplace site is now being redirected to the BSD website. The account will be set to Do Not Sell (DNS) in 14 days.
Link to Customer: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c}
Thank you for your support.
BSD SALES OPERATIONS TEAM
